review_reply.reply_text: Thanks alot for such kind words ! Wish you best of health. 🙏🙏

survey_response.review_text:
Firstly. thank you to all the doctors for being there to fight during this global pandemic. As we all know this pandemic has affected each one of us in some way. 
Thank you Dr. Ramit for being so friendly and for giving healthy diet advices. The way you advised felt like you’re a very honest person with outmost humanity, loving & caring. Thank you for the diet chart which you shared that’s so beneficial and easy to understand which vegetables or products provide what vitamins.
Apologies for reaching late once again. But thank you so much for understanding the situation we were in. 
Lastly, thank you Mr. Sanjay the most helpful person. since the time I have booked an appointment Mr. Sanjay made sure that we get to the location safely. 
I recommend everyone to book an appointment without giving a second thought as trust me it is worth it. Such generosity and humbleness isn’t found these day. 
I wish you all the best and please be the person that you are always. Thank you once again. Stay safe 👍

review_reply.reply_text: Thanks for such nice response! 🙏🙏

survey_response.review_text:
I was suffering from loose motions. I took some remedial measures at home. My condition didn’t improve and frequency of rushing to the toilet increased. I was dehydrated.My wife realised that home treatment won’t work . She decided to take me to Rxpert Clinic. We had heard of Dr Ramit Sambyal as he enjoyed good reputation in our society.
Dr Ramit listened to my problem very patiently and examined me in details. He immediately understood the problem and quickly administered fluids as I was loosing water in my body. Antibiotics were also infected with the fluids.He detained me in the clinic for about four hours After that I was feeling much better. During this period,Dr Ramit was very friendly and proved his medical acumen. His approach toward his patients is very professional and caring.
I feel totally impressed by Dr Ramit and strongly recommend to patients to consult Dr Ramit for any ailment or during emergencies.
Good luck to Dr Ramit Sambyal

review_reply.reply_text: Thanks for your feedback! Hope you had speedy recovery 😊

survey_response.review_text: I had gastritis issue for a long time. He took time to understand my concern. It is hard to find a Doctor who really listen to you. He helped with good medication. **** ****** *

review_reply.reply_text: Thanks alot for the kind words... Speedy recovery!

survey_response.review_text:
Dr. Ramit listened patiently and explained my condition. I am still undergoing treatment as covid takes time to break up with you. Doctor has divided the whole medicine schedule in a way so that it doesn't burden me and scares me off. 
I wasn't sure if I was really infected by covid until I lost my sense of smell and taste. But thankfully I had started my medication before that because doctor identified my symptoms.

review_reply.reply_text: Wish him speedy recovery! 🙏🙏

survey_response.review_text:
My husband was having fever from 7 days ..we connected to Dr Ramit on practo app.
He was very friendly and patient and helped us understand covid and symptoms. He suggested us with few tests and due to correct diagnosis on time , we were saved from being hospitalized. 
Also here I would like to mention that he was always available on chat and responded to all our questions which I liked the most.
I would highly recommend this doctor to everyone

Thank you so much, Doc
